faqs.question: Is this course beginner-friendly?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We start with the fundamentals, assuming you have no prior experience with AI image generation. All you need is a creative spirit and a willingness to learn.

faqs.question: What tools or software do I need?
faqs.answer: The course primarily focuses on concepts and techniques applicable to most platforms. We will have specific examples using Midjourney, but the prompt crafting skills are transferable. You will need a subscription to at least one AI generation service to follow along with the projects.

faqs.question: How long do I have access to the course?
faqs.answer: You get lifetime access! Pay once and receive all future updates, new modules, and additions to the prompt library at no extra cost.

faqs.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the course?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day, no-questions-asked money-back guarantee. If you complete the first two modules and feel it's not for you, just send us an email for a full refund.
